exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat a, b : Tn n R delta : Tn n R -> posreal The term "Rlt_Rminus" has type "forall a b : R, a < b -> 0 < b - a" while it is expected to have type "0 < 1".

original: intros n a b delta. exists (mkposreal 1 Rlt_Rminus). intros x Hbounded. intros Hcontra. apply Hcontra.
